#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
  int n,i,j=0;
  char c[100];
  int ans;
  cin>>n;
  int count=1;
  if(n>0 && n<=40)
  while(count<=n)
  {
	  i=0;
	  ans=0;
	  cin>>c;
	  while(i!=strlen(c))
	  {
		  if(c[i]=='A' || c[i]=='D'||c[i]=='O' ||c[i]=='P' ||c[i]=='Q' ||c[i]=='R')
				  ans++;
		  else if(c[i]=='B')
		  {
			  ans+=2;
		  }
		  i++;
	  }
	  cout<<ans<<endl;
	  if(ans>0)
	  {

		  j++;
	  }
	  count++;
  }
  return 0;
}
